entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 10:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
